command.name: \section
command.label: sectioning,tableofcontents,document structure
command.shortdescription: Sectioning command to create a heading and an entry in the table of contents.
command.description:
This is a description of \section.

  1. The first argument is optional. When present, it will be taken as the entry in the table of contents and for the running head.
  2. The second denotes the name of the section. 

\section{some example section}
